name: Uncollaborative AIs
description:
Logical "Coop" game about escaping testing area of AIs.

If you get stuck on the first level: Move with WASD. Press [SPACE] to drop cookie.

If you die, you can skip whole dialogue by pressing [V].

This game was made for "Wowie Jam 4.0" Game Jam. The theme was "Collaborate With AI".

Everything in the game is created by me in limit of 82 hours.

Reviews and suggestions are welcomed!

By: RabbitDev
